mdRecord.dcterms:title: Group of visitors at Home of Washington, Mount Vernon, Va., May 28, 1889
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dillon, Luke C., 1836-1904
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Luke C. Dillon, Photographer, Washington D. C. Office 935 Penn. Avenue, Pullman's Gallery
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Photograph of visitors on the east lawn including Persian Minister Hajji Hossein-Gholi Khan Noori. Accompanying dignitaries have been identified as: James G. Blaine, Secretary of State; William Windom, Secretary of Treasury; John Noble, Secretary of the Interior; and Sir Julian Paunceforte, Envoy Extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary (England). Reverse of the photographs indicates the picture was taken 'May 28 - 4 (group 4).'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Visitors
